data.description: NST at Sunstone Place! Ferndale's newest condominium community is now under construction. Sunstone Place is a phased project that may include up to a total of 44 units within 11 buildings. Two and Three bedroom condominiums with plenty of parking and green space. Minutes from downtown and the I-5. This unit comes with an outdoor deck, smart switches, mini split heat pump with A/C, floor to ceiling tile master shower, 9 foot ceilings throughout, stainless steel appliances including fridge.
